name: melisplatform/melis-demo-cms-twig
description: A demo Site demonstrating the usage of Twig inside Melis Platform

suggest.melisplatform/melis-engine: MelisEngine provides a set of services and classes to access the CMS pages and data.
suggest.melisplatform/melis-front: MelisFront is the engine that displays website hosted on Melis Platform.
suggest.melisplatform/melis-cms-slider: MelisCmsSlider provides a full Slider system for Melis Platform, including templating plugins.
suggest.melisplatform/melis-cms-news: Provides a venue for creating and maintaining news posts inside Melis Platform
